noAccess_Error: You do not have the required credentials to add content to class "{className}", please contact your administrator.
msg_removeContentInfo: Removing an object from a class leads to the loss of all the inherited classification attributes and their values and it cannot be undone.

msg_addContentsMoreInfo: You do not have the right to modify all the selected objects but they will still inherit the classification attributes from the class.
msg_addContentMoreInfo: You do not have the right to modify the selected object but it will still inherit the classification attributes from the class.
msg_removeContentsMoreInfo: You do not have the right to modify some of the selected objects but they will still lose all the inherited classification attributes and their values and it cannot be undone.
msg_removeContentMoreInfo: You do not have the right to modify the selected object but it will still lose all the inherited classification attributes and their values and it cannot be undone.

msg_info_stateSwitch: Filter is updated to All Maturity States.
CMDMaturityStates_shortHelp:
Filters the libraries and classes based on their maturity state. By default, the filter is set to Active maturity state.
To view the content from other maturity states, click and select the required maturity state.
